<a id="Joint2D"></a>

# Joint2D

**Inherits:** [Node2D](Node2D.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [DampedSpringJoint2D](DampedSpringJoint2D.md), [GrooveJoint2D](GrooveJoint2D.md), [PinJoint2D](PinJoint2D.md)

Abstract base class for all 2D physics joints.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Abstract base class for all joints in 2D physics. 2D joints bind together two physics bodies ([node_a](Joint2D.md#Joint2D_property_node_a) and [node_b](Joint2D.md#Joint2D_property_node_b)) and apply a constraint.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="Joint2D_property_bias"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **bias** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#Joint2D_property_bias)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_bias**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_bias**\ (\ )

When [node_a](Joint2D.md#Joint2D_property_node_a) and [node_b](Joint2D.md#Joint2D_property_node_b) move in different directions the [bias](Joint2D.md#Joint2D_property_bias) controls how fast the joint pulls them back to their original position. The lower the [bias](Joint2D.md#Joint2D_property_bias) the more the two bodies can pull on the joint.

When set to ``0``, the default value from [ProjectSettings.physics/2d/solver/default_constraint_bias](ProjectSettings.md#ProjectSettings_property_physics/2d/solver/default_constraint_bias) is used.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Joint2D_property_disable_collision"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **disable_collision** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#Joint2D_property_disable_collision)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_exclude_nodes_from_collision**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_exclude_nodes_from_collision**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the two bodies bound together do not collide with each other.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Joint2D_property_node_a"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[NodePath](NodePath.md) **node_a** = `NodePath("")` [ðŸ”—](#Joint2D_property_node_a)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_node_a**\ (\ value\: [NodePath](NodePath.md)\ )
- [NodePath](NodePath.md) **get_node_a**\ (\ )

Path to the first body (A) attached to the joint. The node must inherit [PhysicsBody2D](PhysicsBody2D.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Joint2D_property_node_b"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[NodePath](NodePath.md) **node_b** = `NodePath("")` [ðŸ”—](#Joint2D_property_node_b)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_node_b**\ (\ value\: [NodePath](NodePath.md)\ )
- [NodePath](NodePath.md) **get_node_b**\ (\ )

Path to the second body (B) attached to the joint. The node must inherit [PhysicsBody2D](PhysicsBody2D.md).

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

## Method Descriptions

<a id="Joint2D_method_get_rid"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[RID](RID.md) **get_rid**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#Joint2D_method_get_rid)

Returns the joint's internal [RID](RID.md) from the [PhysicsServer2D](PhysicsServer2D.md).
